description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for "English Writing"

  App offers quizzes and tutorials to help you learn English Writing

  App is continuously updated based on your feedback.

  App offers 14 tutorials and 2 quizzes with search feature.


  Includes following tutorials:

  Introduction,
  Writing Systems,
  Thinking And Planning,
  Effective Writing,
  Writing Process,
  Grammar And Writing,
  Some Myths,
  Resume Writing,
  Scientific Writing,
  Writing Summary,
  Business Plan Writing,
  Writing Emails,
  Writing Proposals,
  Appendix.


  Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

  Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

  Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
